statements: SELECT * FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_type FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT * FROM geofencing_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, geographic_area FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE geographic_area = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND vehicle_id = 101 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alert_id, vehicle_id, alert_type FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 105 AND alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM geofencing_alerts GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type, geographic_area FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-02-15' ORDER BY geographic_area, alert_type;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM geofencing_alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE 'Zone%' AND geographic_area IN ('Zone A', 'Zone B') ORDER BY alert_id ASC, alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT rule_name, geofence_area FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_id = 4;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, location_name, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY longitude, latitude LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE ST_CONTAINS(geofence_area, POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)) AND alert_threshold > 50;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, ST_AsText(geofence_area) AS geofence_area_text, alert_threshold FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%Zone%' ORDER BY alert_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, area_name FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY current_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE ST_DWithin(current_location, 'POINT(0 0)', 1000);
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_coordinates) FROM geofence_areas WHERE ST_IsEmpty(area_coordinates) = FALSE;
SELECT vehicle_name, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM vehicles JOIN alerts ON vehicles.vehicle_id = alerts.vehicle_id ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_name, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT min_latitude, max_latitude, min_longitude, max_longitude FROM geo_fence_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT area_name, COUNT(tracking_id) AS total_trackings FROM geo_fence_areas LEFT JOIN vehicle_tracking ON geo_fence_areas.area_id = vehicle_tracking.area_id GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alert_history WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE location_name = 'HQ' ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT area_name, min_latitude, max_latitude, min_longitude FROM geo_fence_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT tracking_id, area_id, is_inside FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE is_inside = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alert_history WHERE alert_type LIKE '%Warning%' AND vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle;
SELECT id, name FROM geographic_area;
SELECT vehicle_type, name FROM vehicle WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM geofence_alert WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding';
SELECT area_id, entry_time FROM entry_event ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, vehicle_type FROM vehicle ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM geographic_area WHERE area_type = 'City';
SELECT vehicle.name, geographic_area.name FROM vehicle INNER JOIN geofence_alert ON vehicle.id = geofence_alert.vehicle_id INNER JOIN geographic_area ON geofence_alert.area_id = geographic_area.id;
SELECT * FROM entry_event WHERE entry_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
